title: Let's have an election GD!
body:
Post who you want to be president.

The first 10 names will be the possible candidate for the elections.

However, there are two requirements for becoming president:

- Has to be a NA poster
- Needs to be active (for example, if the last time you've posted is on the old GD, you can't be elected for president)
- Not permabanned

When the 10 names will be chosen, I'll make another thread with a poll, so GD can vote.

Let's go! :)

EDIT: **YOU CAN'T VOTE FOR YOURSELF**
